ARABIC: قُلْ جَآءَ ٱلْحَقُّ وَمَا يُبْدِئُ ٱلْبَٰطِلُ وَمَا يُعِيدُ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: Say: 'The Truth has come. Falsehood cannot originate or regenerate.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Say: "The truth has come, and falsehood had neither precedence nor will reappear."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Say: “The Truth has come and falsehood can neither originate nor recreate anything.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Say, "The truth has come. Falsehood has vanished and it will not come back again".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Proclaim, “The truth has come, and falsehood dare not commence nor return.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Say: "The truth has come, and the falsehood can neither create anything nor resurrect."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Say: The truth has come, and the falsehood shall vanish and shall not come back.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Say. 'Truth has come; falsehood originates not, nor brings again.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Say: The Truth hath come, and falsehood showeth not its face and will not return.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Say to them, "The Truth has come and will endure. Falsehood has no power to originate any good, nor to reproduce it."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Say thou: the truth is come, and falsehood shall neither originate nor be restored."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: Say, ‘The truth has come, and falsehood neither originates nor restores [anything].’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Say: "The Truth has arrived, and Falsehood neither creates anything new, nor restores anything."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Say (O Muhammad SAW): "The truth (the Quran and Allah's Inspiration) has come, and AlBatil [falsehood - Iblis (Satan)] can neither create anything nor resurrect (anything)."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Say: 'Truth has come. Falsehood has vanished and shall return no more.'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Say, “The Truth has come; while falsehood can neither originate, nor regenerate.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Say, "The truth has come, and falsehood can neither begin [anything] nor repeat [it]."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [34:49] Say: ‘The truth, Islam, has come. And falsehood, disbelief, neither originates nor restores [anything]’, in other words, it leaves no trace [of itself] behind.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Say) to them, Muhammad: (The Truth hath come) Islam has become manifest and the Muslims numerous, (and falsehood showeth not its face) Satan and the idols do not create (and will not return) and will not revive the dead.
